pages.text: $(li)Turtle Eggs can be placed on the ground right clicking while you are holding them in your hand.$(br)$(li)With enought time, the egg will hatch into a $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/turtle)Turtle$(/l).$(br)$(li)Turtle Eggs can be used in multiple recipes in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).
